name: Chorus Sleep
headline: Mobile app and coaching program that helps employees sleep better
description: Chorus is a mobile app and coaching program that helps employees sleep better. We do this by combining sleep coaching, short lessons, and relaxing audio sessions that help employees, and their families, fall asleep faster and get better quality sleep through the night.

founders.name: Ali Abramovitz, Founder
founders.description: Ali is the CEO of Chorus Sleep, which is a mobile app and coaching program that helps employees sleep better. Before Chorus, Ali did a mix of business and product at Twilio, and prior to that, she was an analyst at a hedge fund.

founders.name: MK Hurlbutt, Founder
founders.description: MK is the co-founder and Chief of Experience & Community at Chorus. Prior to Chorus, she spent 6 years as a SoulCycle Instructor in the Bay Area, helping to open the downtown SOMA location in 2014 and was promoted to Master Instructor in 2019. She has a passion for building communities around health and wellness and is committed to making these resources diverse, inclusive, and accessible to all.

founders.name: Warren Runk, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Chorus Meditation: https://chorusmeditation.com. Long time software engineer, technical leader, meditator, and passionate entrepreneur. Hopefully more amazing characters and symbols will be added to this box soon!

raw_markdown='[![Chorus Sleep Logo](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/ChorusSleepLogo2.3e61debc.svg)](https://www.chorussleep.com/</>)
[Individuals](https://www.chorussleep.com/</individuals/>)[Employers](https://www.chorussleep.com/</employers/>)[Research](https://www.chorussleep.com/</research/>)[Blog](https://www.chorussleep.com/</blog/>)[About](https://www.chorussleep.com/</about/>)
[Login](https://www.chorussleep.com/<https:/flapp.chorussleep.com>)[Get Started](https://www.chorussleep.com/</portal/>)
![Delighted Woman Background](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/delighted-woman.64d39459.webp)
# Chorus is **the only comprehensive sleep solution on the market**
Hi, we’re Chorus Sleep, the only comprehensive sleep solution on the market. **We solve mild to severe sleep issues like insomnia, sleep apnea, menopause-related sleep challenges, and more!**
[Get Started](https://www.chorussleep.com/</portal/>)Not a partner yet? [Learn more](https://www.chorussleep.com/</employers/>)
# As covered in 
[](https://www.chorussleep.com/<https:/www.inc.com/rebecca-hinds/want-to-become-a-better-leader-you-need-to-sleep-on-it.html>)[](https://www.chorussleep.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2019/11/15/business/the-work-diary-of-an-audio-erotica-ceo.html >)
![](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/threePhones.1085b8b3.webp)
# More than just another sleep app 
Go beyond sleep tracking or simple relaxation content. **Chorus is the only solution that combines everything you need for better sleep into one simple app.** From insomnia to sleep apnea, mild or severe. We’ve got you covered.
# Here’s how it works 
# 01
**Track your sleep** to measure progress.
# 02
**Fall asleep fast** with expert-led relaxation sessions and sleep sounds like white noise.
# 03
**Learn to improve your sleep** with short, interactive content and easy at-home diagnostic tests for sleep apnea or more severe insomnia.
# 04
**Get help** from a real, human sleep coach on your specific program or easily procure sleep apnea devices quickly and affordably.
![](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/support_two.c568af6f.webp)
# Chorus is all-natural and evidence-based, helping you wake up refreshed. 
# Evidence-based to help you be at your best 
# 37%
Improvement in time to fall asleep
# 30%
Improvement in awakenings in the night
# 55%
Improvement in collaboration at work
# Fall asleep faster. Stay asleep longer
# FAQs 
What is Chorus' sleep solution?
How does it work?
How does the breathwork in the Sleep Sessions help me?
# Sleep is the foundation of health
Research shows that sleep is the foundation of health. Experts used to think that sleep was one of many "pillars" of health, along with diet and exercise. However, experts now agree that sleep is the foundation everyone needs first for brain and body processes to function correctly.This means that unless we are sleeping well, it doesn't matter how much we diet, exercise, meditate, speak with a therapist - you name it - without adequate sleep, we will not feel well.
# For Individuals
Sleep better - period.
[Learn More](https://www.chorussleep.com/</individuals/>)
# For Employers
Support and retain your hard-working employees with the most foundational benefit on the market.
[Learn More](https://www.chorussleep.com/</employers/>)
![](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/privacy.1ec881be.webp)
# Your Privacy Matters
Privacy is our top priority. All data is securely stored and **no personal data is ever shared** with anyone outside of Chorus.
Data end-to-end encrypted
GDPR / CCPA Compliant
Your data NEVER leaves our system, ever
# Employees at top companies**love Chorus Sleep**

# What top leaders are saying
![Stephanie B.](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/stephanie.fc962ef5.png)
"**Sleep is fundamental to well-being, yet it’s often overlooked until problems arise.** At TAG, we’re rethinking team member benefits to **provide holistic support from the foundation up** —not just for our team members, but for their families too. The **Chorus Sleep partnership helps us meet our team members and their loved ones where they are, helping everyone achieve better health together."**
# Stephanie B.
# The Aspen Group
![The Aspen Group](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/tag-logo.80db1d33.webp)
![Cory R.](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/cory-rose.d8df70d6.png)
“A lot of our team members lead very busy lives, both inside and outside of work. For them,"**sleep support has been huge.** It’s foundational to their health and because *our bodies all require sleep*, it’s something they **can more easily fit into their lives.”**
# Cory R.
# The Aspen Group
![The Aspen Group](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/tag-logo.80db1d33.webp)
![Rebecca H.](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/rebecca.6c7f07d8.webp)
We are thrilled to partner with Chorus to understand how sleep impacts collaboration and productivity at work—to be able to help organizations set their employees up for success.
# Rebecca H.
# Asana
![Asana](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/asana.5a49964f.webp)
![Alyson W.](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/alyson.38d3437a.webp)
I'm thrilled to support our employees' sleep since it's critical to their wellbeing.
# Alyson W.
# Modern Health
![Modern Health](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/modern-health.661f89e0.png)
![Andy H.](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/andy.379d1b91.webp)
Chorus helps my employees sleep better so they can be at their best.
# Andy H.
# Aviron Interactive
![Aviron Interactive](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/aviron.77d95c57.png)
# What employees are saying 
![Emma R](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/emma.550b17c9.png)
★★★★★
It **feels great to know my company cares about me and my sleep**. I appreciate that [my employer] provides benefits like this
# Emma R
![Taylor G](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/taylor.cb0053dc.webp)
★★★★★
I used to have trouble quieting my thoughts, but Chorus stops all of that in its tracks so I can **fall asleep faster**
# Taylor G
![Macy H](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/macy.7c3d58c7.webp)
★★★★★
[Since using Chorus], I’ve been **waking up less frequently in the night.**
# Macy H
![Avani P](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/avaniP.c38ff709.webp)
★★★★★
**I slept like a baby!** Thank you for these sleep sessions!
# Avani P
![Andrew D](https://www.chorussleep.com/_next/static/media/andrewD.f4d10c6d.webp)
★★★★★
I find Chorus' Sleep Sessions are **powerful and often more effective** than [other apps'] Sleep Stories
# Andrew D

generated_description:
**Chorus Sleep: A New Approach to Rest**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from the prestigious Y Combinator's Batch W21, Chorus Sleep is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to tackle the increasingly prevalent issue of sleep deprivation—especially among employees. Their approach isn’t just about counting sheep; it’s about providing comprehensive solutions for better sleep.

**What is Chorus Sleep?**

Chorus Sleep offers a mobile app and coaching program designed to help individuals, particularly employees, improve their sleep quality. The service combines sleep coaching, brief educational lessons, and soothing audio sessions to help users fall asleep faster and improve the quality of sleep overnight. This isn’t merely an app for tracking your sleep; it’s a holistic, evidence-based platform that addresses issues ranging from insomnia and sleep apnea to challenges related to menopause.

**How Does It Work?**

Chorus Sleep follows a straightforward process:
1. **Track Your Sleep:** Users can measure their sleep patterns and assess their progress.
2. **Relax and Sleep:** Expert-led sessions and calming sounds, like white noise, help users nod off quickly.
3. **Learn Effectively:** Users access interactive content and diagnostics to better understand their sleep issues.
4. **Human Assistance:** Real, human coaches are on hand to guide users through personalized programs.

The impact is significant. Users have reported a 37% improvement in the time taken to fall asleep, a 30% reduction in nighttime awakenings, and a remarkable 55% improvement in workplace collaboration.

**Why Sleep is Critical?**

Chorus Sleep's ethos rests on the understanding that sleep is foundational to health. It’s not just another health barometer to tick off; rather, it's the cornerstone upon which our physical and mental well-being is built. If we're not well-rested, everything else—whether it's diet management or stress control—becomes futile.

**The Team Behind Chorus**

Currently operating with a lean team of four and guided by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Chorus Sleep is perfectly positioned in the bustling San Francisco Bay Area—a hub for health tech innovation. 

**The Backing**

The startup has caught the eye of notable investors in the Bay Area, showcasing its strong potential in the market. They are not just backed financially—teams at companies like LinkedIn, Asana, and Modern Health are already leveraging Chorus Sleep to boost employee well-being, proving it’s a sought-after benefit.

**Privacy Matters**

Chorus Sleep emphasizes robust data security. They adhere to strict privacy regulations, ensuring that no personal data is shared outside their system. Customers can focus on their sleep improvement without anxiety over data breaches.

**Final Thoughts**

Chorus Sleep is redefining how we view sleep in the context of wellness at work. In this fast-paced world where burnout is a growing concern, thinking about sleep health isn’t just smart—it’s essential. If you're an individual struggling to catch those Z’s or an employer eager to support your workforce, Chorus Sleep might just be the answer you’ve been searching for. 

For more details, you can explore their offerings at [Chorus Sleep](https://www.chorussleep.com/).
